ulou@chalhoub.com>; Bonsu Prempeh <Bonsu.Prempeh@chalhoub.com>; Jasmina Banda <Jasmina.Banda@chalhoub.com>; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: JV Middle East - insurance coverage 
 

Hi Hagop, Sarah,

 

Since it’s clear that D&O insurance and Cyber are not insurances that currently exist at Chalhoub (according to counterpart colleagues) and there is a question mark around Marine Cargo, and I am still waiting your feedback on Liability and Property, OTB Group are suggesting the following:

 

*****************************

 

To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on Chalhoub coverages for:

*	Property All Risks
*	Liability
*	Marine Cargo

And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end.

 

 

I am not the expert in Insurances so I would like someone here on this thread to advise in regards to the above that there are no implications for OTB Middle East to use the Insurances of D&O and Cyber of OTB, and it would be great if the certificated of Property, Liability and Marine Cargo could be shared. If the sharing is not possible then I would be open to receiving suggestions on how I can close this topic or a recommendation as to whether I opt for all the Insurances to be under OTB HQ and whether I can actually do this. I can also connect someone to the Insurance counterpart in OTB to discuss in further detail?

Ciao Caroline,

Just a quick reminder following our call.

Regarding the insurance coverage, we need to understand if there is already some coverage in place or if we need to include the OTB Middle East companies in the OTB Group insurance programs.

The policies in question are:

*	Property All Risks
*	Liability
*	D&O (Directors & Officers)
*	Cyber
*	Marine Cargo

Could you please let me know to whom I should refer for more information?

Thanks a lot.

 

Thansk a lot

تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME. 

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

	Please note that insurance coverages are also part of and mentioned in the boutique agreements, so we need to address this topic as well. OK noted

	Thanks a lot

	Sara

	 

	Sara

	 

	 

________________________________

	From: Caroline Bennett <Caroline.Bennett@chalhoub.com <mailto:Caroline.Bennett@chalhoub.com> >

	Cc: Corrado Conti <Corrado_Conti@otb.net <mailto:Corrado_Conti@otb.net> >
	Subject: RE: JV Middle East - insurance coverage 

	 

	This message comes from OUTSIDE the OTB Group

	Do NOT reply, click on links or open attachments unless you acknowledge the sender and know the content is secure.

	Report Suspicious <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fus-phishalarm-ewt.proofpoint.com%2FEWT%2Fv1%2FDQDXGDqbyQ!WoRoZz8XsaYZCX92kY4MDCTQ2MWl5CcYrrfr0Ohx3ubS0YOa_H5ouUIqlh8c3G5aejoZ5v-1puW5-Du0K3rUtKpJLPIT37fwoXJMLhl_3kQs7IvvCrlk-xDClJZbs3gmqW9RlZ2BhtEX%24&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C153fa4751fea4d2d372508dcf4cb90c4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638654402409832147%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=sfTnLf4WKjHvVzshMeCwrHuHKCUHqbQAT7kWCrZwOPE%3D&reserved=0> 

	 

	Hi Sara,

	 

	Hope all is well!

	 

	Just to give an update on Insurance as I know I owe you some answers.

	 

	Full transparency – it has been quite tough securing information and understanding what is the reality and who is responsible for it hence the timeframe it has taken to get back to you.

	 

	In any case I can confirm that for the following we do not have it in place:

	 

	1.	Cyber
	2.	D&O (Directors and Officers)

	 

	There is someone called Dee Deu (dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> ) (Director of Internet Security) who said that for Cyber they are currently exploring packages for Cyber security as a Group.

meone called Dee Deu (dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> ) (Director of Internet Security) who said that for Cyber they are currently exploring packages for Cyber security as a Group. She said if the tech team want to get in touch with her to discuss how it can be implemented for OTB ME then that would be good. Perhaps this could involve Daniele and Aurelien.

	 

	Then there is Margot from HR ops at Chalhoub margot.diab@chalhoub.com <mailto:margot.diab@chalhoub.com>  – again not in place for D&O but she can secure quotations if needed, she is open to a discussions too.

	 

	For the remainder.  I think I have now pinpointed the person who can confidently advise, and it seems like we will have coverage, but allow me a little more time to give you a 100% and to give details.

	 

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo (apparently this is a complicated topic but there may be a group one that covers it)

	 

	Sorry my answer isn’t more full but that is the latest update.

	 

	Thanks,

	Caroline

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

CAROLINE BENNETT​​​​

GENERAL MANAGER

MICHEL CHALHOUB TRADING CO LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

Regarding the insurance coverage, we need to understand if there is already some coverage in place or if we need to include the OTB Middle East companies in the OTB Group insurance programs.

	The policies in question are:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	D&O (Directors & Officers)
	4.	Cyber
	5.	Marine Cargo

	Could you please let me know to whom I should refer for more information?

	Thanks a lot.

	 

	Thansk a lot

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Stanca <Simone_Stanca@otb.net <mailto:Simone_Stanca@otb.net> >; Giulia Steccanella <Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net <mailto:Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net> >
	Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

	 

	CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
	تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME. 

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

	Thanks a lot

	Sara

	 

	Sara

	Hi Sara,

	 

	Hope all is well!

	 

	Just to give an update on Insurance as I know I owe you some answers.

	 

	Full transparency – it has been quite tough securing information and understanding what is the reality and who is responsible for it hence the timeframe it has taken to get back to you.

Full transparency – it has been quite tough securing information and understanding what is the reality and who is responsible for it hence the timeframe it has taken to get back to you.

	 

	In any case I can confirm that for the following we do not have it in place:

	 

	1.	Cyber
	2.	D&O (Directors and Officers)

	 

	There is someone called Dee Deu (dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> ) (Director of Internet Security) who said that for Cyber they are currently exploring packages for Cyber security as a Group. She said if the tech team want to get in touch with her to discuss how it can be implemented for OTB ME then that would be good. Perhaps this could involve Daniele and Aurelien.

	 

	Then there is Margot from HR ops at Chalhoub margot.diab@chalhoub.com <mailto:margot.diab@chalhoub.com>  – again not in place for D&O but she can secure quotations if needed, she is open to a discussions too.

	 

	For the remainder.  I think I have now pinpointed the person who can confidently advise, and it seems like we will have coverage, but allow me a little more time to give you a 100% and to give details.

	 

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo (apparently this is a complicated topic but there may be a group one that covers it)

	 

	Sorry my answer isn’t more full but that is the latest update.

	 

	Thanks,

	Caroline

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

CAROLINE BENNETT​​​​

GENERAL MANAGER

MICHEL CHALHOUB TRADING CO LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

Regarding the insurance coverage, we need to understand if there is already some coverage in place or if we need to include the OTB Middle East companies in the OTB Group insurance programs.

	The policies in question are:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	D&O (Directors & Officers)
	4.	Cyber
	5.	Marine Cargo

	Could you please let me know to whom I should refer for more information?

	Thanks a lot.

	 

	Thansk a lot

From: Caroline Bennett <Caroline.Bennett@chalhoub.com>
Date: Wednesday, 23 October 2024 at 10:40 AM
To: Sarah Alasadi <Sarah.Alasadi@chalhoub.com>, Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Thalia Papadopoulou <Efthalia.Papadopoulou@chalhoub.com>, Bonsu Prempeh <Bonsu.Prempeh@chalhoub.com>, Jasmina Banda <Jasmina.Banda@chalhoub.com>, Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

Hi Hagop, Sarah,

 

Since it’s clear that D&O insurance and Cyber are not insurances that currently exist at Chalhoub (according to counterpart colleagues) and there is a question mark around Marine Cargo, and I am still waiting your feedback on Liability and Property, OTB Group are suggesting the following:

 

*****************************

 

To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on Chalhoub coverages for:

*	Property All Risks
*	Liability
*	Marine Cargo

And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end.

 

 

I am not the expert in Insurances so I would like someone here on this thread to advise in regards to the above that there are no implications for OTB Middle East to use the Insurances of D&O and Cyber of OTB, and it would be great if the certificated of Property, Liability and Marine Cargo could be shared.

I can also connect someone to the Insurance counterpart in OTB to discuss in further detail?

 

On a separate note, the Insurances are a part of and mentioned in the Boutique agreement so we will need to close that topic aswell.

Caroline

From: Caroline Bennett <Caroline.Bennett@chalhoub.com>
Date: Wednesday, 23 October 2024 at 10:40 AM
To: Sarah Alasadi <Sarah.Alasadi@chalhoub.com>, Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Thalia Papadopoulou <Efthalia.Papadopoulou@chalhoub.com>, Bonsu Prempeh <Bonsu.Prempeh@chalhoub.com>, Jasmina Banda <Jasmina.Banda@chalhoub.com>, Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

Hi Hagop, Sarah,

 

Since it’s clear that D&O insurance and Cyber are not insurances that currently exist at Chalhoub (according to counterpart colleagues) and there is a question mark around Marine Cargo, and I am still waiting your feedback on Liability and Property, OTB Group are suggesting the following:

 

*****************************

 

To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on Chalhoub coverages for:

*	Property All Risks
*	Liability
*	Marine Cargo

And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end.

 

 

I am not the expert in Insurances so I would like someone here on this thread to advise in regards to the above that there are no implications for OTB Middle East to use the Insurances of D&O and Cyber of OTB, and it would be great if the certificated of Property, Liability and Marine Cargo could be shared.

I got the feedback from OTB on the policies you shared. It’s all good.

*	Property All Risks

Thank You

Caroline

Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

 

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Stanca <Simone_Stanca@otb.net <mailto:Simone_Stanca@otb.net> >; Giulia Steccanella <Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net <mailto:Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net> >
	Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

	 

	CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
	تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME. 

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

Full transparency – it has been quite tough securing information and understanding what is the reality and who is responsible for it hence the timeframe it has taken to get back to you.

	 

	In any case I can confirm that for the following we do not have it in place:

	 

	1.	Cyber
	2.	D&O (Directors and Officers)

	 

	There is someone called Dee Deu (dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> ) (Director of Internet Security) who said that for Cyber they are currently exploring packages for Cyber security as a Group. She said if the tech team want to get in touch with her to discuss how it can be implemented for OTB ME then that would be good. Perhaps this could involve Daniele and Aurelien.

	 

	Then there is Margot from HR ops at Chalhoub margot.diab@chalhoub.com <mailto:margot.diab@chalhoub.com>  – again not in place for D&O but she can secure quotations if needed, she is open to a discussions too.

	 

	For the remainder.  I think I have now pinpointed the person who can confidently advise, and it seems like we will have coverage, but allow me a little more time to give you a 100% and to give details.

	 

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo (apparently this is a complicated topic but there may be a group one that covers it)

	 

	Sorry my answer isn’t more full but that is the latest update.

	 

	Thanks,

	Caroline

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

CAROLINE BENNETT​​​​

GENERAL MANAGER

MICHEL CHALHOUB TRADING CO LLC

DUBAI

chunks.text:
Just a quick reminder following our call.

	Regarding the insurance coverage, we need to understand if there is already some coverage in place or if we need to include the OTB Middle East companies in the OTB Group insurance programs.

	The policies in question are:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	D&O (Directors & Officers)
	4.	Cyber
	5.	Marine Cargo

	Could you please let me know to whom I should refer for more information?

	Thanks a lot.

	 

	Thansk a lot

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Caroline Bennett <Caroline.Bennett@chalhoub.com>
CC: Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com>; Bonsu Prempeh <Bonsu.Prempeh@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-15 12:09
Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Caroline,

Thank you for your below e-mail.

For the sake of good order please advise the values you would like to insure as per the below template for the property insurance.

Store / Unit Number

Location

Coverage Start Date

Stocks

Furniture, Fixture & Equipment

Gross Profit (6 months)

 

 

 

 

 

 







 

*	
	Stocks Value should be declared at landed cost (expected average stock value at any one time)
*	
	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)
*	6 month Gross Profit (based on budgeted estimates)

 

I will add OTB ME as an additional insured under the policies of Allied Enterprises LLC. Allied will pay the premium and recharge to OTB ME the premium portion of OTB ME. This is to avoid lengthy KYC requirements.

*	Premium charges will be around 0.06% for the property insurance and around 0.1% for the marine insurance based on the values insured.

*	
	Liability insurance is based on estimated annual turnover (premium rate is 0.0035% of annual TO). Generally it comes more or less around AED 500 per store.
*	
	Please coordinate the imports with our logistics department so that the shipments are logged in the system and declared to the insurer.

	VAT Registration

Upon receipt of the above details, we can have appropriate cover in place within 2 working days.

Do let me know if any clarification is required on the above.

Best Regards,
Hagop

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000.

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Stanca <Simone_Stanca@otb.net <mailto:Simone_Stanca@otb.net> >; Giulia Steccanella <Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net <mailto:Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net> >

	تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME.

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

	Thanks a lot

	Sara

Full transparency – it has been quite tough securing information and understanding what is the reality and who is responsible for it hence the timeframe it has taken to get back to you.

	 

	In any case I can confirm that for the following we do not have it in place:

	 

	1.	Cyber
	2.	D&O (Directors and Officers)

	 

	There is someone called Dee Deu (dee.deu@chalhoub.com <mailto:dee.deu@chalhoub.com> ) (Director of Internet Security) who said that for Cyber they are currently exploring packages for Cyber security as a Group. She said if the tech team want to get in touch with her to discuss how it can be implemented for OTB ME then that would be good. Perhaps this could involve Daniele and Aurelien.

	 

	Then there is Margot from HR ops at Chalhoub margot.diab@chalhoub.com <mailto:margot.diab@chalhoub.com>  – again not in place for D&O but she can secure quotations if needed, she is open to a discussions too.

	 

	For the remainder.  I think I have now pinpointed the person who can confidently advise, and it seems like we will have coverage, but allow me a little more time to give you a 100% and to give details.

	 

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo (apparently this is a complicated topic but there may be a group one that covers it)

	 

	Sorry my answer isn’t more full but that is the latest update.

	 

	Thanks,

	Caroline

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

	 

CAROLINE BENNETT​​​​

Just a quick reminder following our call.

	Regarding the insurance coverage, we need to understand if there is already some coverage in place or if we need to include the OTB Middle East companies in the OTB Group insurance programs.

	The policies in question are:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	D&O (Directors & Officers)
	4.	Cyber
	5.	Marine Cargo

	Could you please let me know to whom I should refer for more information?

	Thanks a lot.

	 

	Thansk a lot

Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

 

Dear Caroline,

 

Thank you for your below e-mail.

 

For the sake of good order please advise the values you would like to insure as per the below template for the property insurance.

 

Store / Unit Number

Location

Coverage Start Date

Stocks

Furniture, Fixture & Equipment

Gross Profit (6 months)

 

 

 

 

 

 

						

 

*	Stocks Value should be declared at landed cost (expected average stock value at any one time)

*	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)

*	6 month Gross Profit (based on budgeted estimates)

 

I will add OTB ME as an additional insured under the policies of Allied Enterprises LLC. Allied will pay the premium and recharge to OTB ME the premium portion of OTB ME. This is to avoid lengthy KYC requirements.

*                Premium charges will be around 0.06% for the property insurance and around 0.1% for the marine insurance based on the values insured.

*                Liability insurance is based on estimated annual turnover (premium rate is 0.0035% of annual TO). Generally it comes more or less around AED 500 per store.

*                Trade license

*                VAT Registration

Upon receipt of the above details, we can have appropriate cover in place within 2 working days.

 

Do let me know if any clarification is required on the above.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

 

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME.

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

	Please note that insurance coverages are also part of and mentioned in the boutique agreements, so we need to address this topic as well. OK noted

	Thanks a lot

Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

 

Dear Caroline,

 

Thank you for your below e-mail.

 

For the sake of good order please advise the values you would like to insure as per the below template for the property insurance.

 

Store / Unit Number

Location

Coverage Start Date

Stocks

Furniture, Fixture & Equipment

Gross Profit (6 months)

 

 

 

 

 

 

						

 

*	Stocks Value should be declared at landed cost (expected average stock value at any one time)

*	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)

chunks.text:
*	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)

*	6 month Gross Profit (based on budgeted estimates)

 

I will add OTB ME as an additional insured under the policies of Allied Enterprises LLC. Allied will pay the premium and recharge to OTB ME the premium portion of OTB ME. This is to avoid lengthy KYC requirements.

*                Premium charges will be around 0.06% for the property insurance and around 0.1% for the marine insurance based on the values insured.

*                Liability insurance is based on estimated annual turnover (premium rate is 0.0035% of annual TO). Generally it comes more or less around AED 500 per store.

*                Please coordinate the imports with our logistics department so that the shipments are logged in the system and declared to the insurer.

Finally, please provide the following documents in order to be able to add OTB as additional insured:

*                Trade license

*                VAT Registration

Upon receipt of the above details, we can have appropriate cover in place within 2 working days.

 

Do let me know if any clarification is required on the above.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end.

Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME.

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

	Please note that insurance coverages are also part of and mentioned in the boutique agreements, so we need to address this topic as well. OK noted

	Thanks a lot

	Sara

Dear Caroline,

 

Thank you for your below e-mail.

 

For the sake of good order please advise the values you would like to insure as per the below template for the property insurance.

 

Store / Unit Number

Location

Coverage Start Date

Stocks

Furniture, Fixture & Equipment

Gross Profit (6 months)

 

 

 

 

 

 

						

 

*	Stocks Value should be declared at landed cost (expected average stock value at any one time)

*	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)

*	6 month Gross Profit (based on budgeted estimates)

 

I will add OTB ME as an additional insured under the policies of Allied Enterprises LLC. Allied will pay the premium and recharge to OTB ME the premium portion of OTB ME. This is to avoid lengthy KYC requirements.

*                Premium charges will be around 0.06% for the property insurance and around 0.1% for the marine insurance based on the values insured.

*                Liability insurance is based on estimated annual turnover (premium rate is 0.0035% of annual TO). Generally it comes more or less around AED 500 per store.

*                Please coordinate the imports with our logistics department so that the shipments are logged in the system and declared to the insurer.

Finally, please provide the following documents in order to be able to add OTB as additional insured:

*                Trade license

*                VAT Registration

Upon receipt of the above details, we can have appropriate cover in place within 2 working days.

 

Do let me know if any clarification is required on the above.

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

Stanca <Simone_Stanca@otb.net <mailto:Simone_Stanca@otb.net> >; Giulia Steccanella <Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net <mailto:Giulia_Steccanella@otb.net> >
	Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

	 

	CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.
	تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

	Dear Caroline,

	Thank you very much for your email.

	To clarify, at OTB, we have all the insurance coverages I listed previously, so this should not be an issue. We can rely on your coverages for:

	1.	Property All Risks
	2.	Liability
	3.	Marine Cargo

	And then integrate with ours for D&O and Cyber.

	If you agree to proceed in this manner, could you please provide the documents for your insurance coverages so we can ensure they are aligned with ours? Otherwise, we can handle the activation of everything on our end. According to the Chalhoub contact for Insurances, it was advised that D&O and Cyber is good to be activated by OTB as you suggest. For the Property, Liability and Marine Cargo it is easy to activate once we are fully Operational with the JV (eg: bank account open, VAT done etc) – for now we are covered under MCT/Allied but we will need to be re-registered for OTB ME.

	He will provide the policies today/tomorrow to be checked by OTB for alignment, and if in agreement we can get him to go ahead and activate and if not then we could take everything OTB end.

	I have also copied our colleague @Paola De Peron <mailto:Paola_De_Peron@otb.net> , who is in charge of this matter.

Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

 

Dear Caroline,

 

Thank you for your below e-mail.

 

For the sake of good order please advise the values you would like to insure as per the below template for the property insurance.

 

Store / Unit Number

Location

Coverage Start Date

Stocks

Furniture, Fixture & Equipment

Gross Profit (6 months)

 

 

 

 

 

 

						

 

*	Stocks Value should be declared at landed cost (expected average stock value at any one time)

*	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)

chunks.text:
*	Furniture, Fixtures & Equipment at original purchase value (not net-book value)

*	6 month Gross Profit (based on budgeted estimates)

 

I will add OTB ME as an additional insured under the policies of Allied Enterprises LLC. Allied will pay the premium and recharge to OTB ME the premium portion of OTB ME. This is to avoid lengthy KYC requirements.

*                Premium charges will be around 0.06% for the property insurance and around 0.1% for the marine insurance based on the values insured.

*                Liability insurance is based on estimated annual turnover (premium rate is 0.0035% of annual TO). Generally it comes more or less around AED 500 per store.

*                Please coordinate the imports with our logistics department so that the shipments are logged in the system and declared to the insurer.

Finally, please provide the following documents in order to be able to add OTB as additional insured:

*                Trade license

*                VAT Registration

Upon receipt of the above details, we can have appropriate cover in place within 2 working days.

 

Do let me know if any clarification is required on the above.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Subject: Re: JV Middle East - insurance coverage

 

Dear Caroline and Sara,

 

I’m forwarding the sample policies for your review.

 

Please note that the policies have been renewed effective September 24, 2024, though documentation issuance is still in progress.

 

Enclosed are the latest versions available, with terms remaining consistent across the policies for the upcoming period.

 

There is only one change to the property insurance renewed policy which is an increase in the deductible for water damage, raised from USD 400 to USD 2,000. This adjustment is due to the significant losses sustained by the insurance industry as a result of the recent heavy rains. All other terms remain unchanged.

 

Please feel free to reach out should you require for any further information.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
